mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_REPLY_INFO(UI_NUM, PI_NUM, PRI_NAME, PRI_EMAIL, PRI_CONTENT, PRI_RATE) VALUES(#{uiNum}, #{piNum}, #{priName}, #{priEmail}, #{priContent}, #{priRate})
